MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 07-JAN-2021 19:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut affecting the LL13 and LL11 postcode areas of Wrexham and Marchwell. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:32PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of work required to repair a grounded conductor and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:18pm on 7th January 2021.
